attributes.action: create a new tax to charge adult cyclists for cycle lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an increasing demand for more cycle lanes and yet unlike motorcycle and car owners, cyclists who do not own motorised transport, do not pay tax toward the construction and maintenance of these lanes.  This is lunacy, as I am sure the majority of the voting public agree that all adults using the roads should pay their fair share.

rejection.details: This is very similar to an existing petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bicycle-tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
